message:
The Democratic Party of Wisconsin spoke out forcefully Tuesday after it was discovered that the state Capitol had blocked a website that was attempting to organize those protesting Republican Gov. Scott Walker's plan to strip unions of their rights.

‎"Anyone trying to use the state Capitol's Wi-Fi connection to access www.defendwisconsin.org Monday & early Tuesday received an error message... 'In a direct assault on the First Amendment, Scott Walker's administration is blocking access in the Wisconsin Capitol to opposition websites,' Wisconsin Democratic Party press secretary Graeme Zielinski told CNN."

http://www.rawstory.com/rs/2011/02/22/wisconsin-capitol-blocks-pro-union-website/
